targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host"  where ("host" =~ /^$Host$/)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("free") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last("used_percent"), (last("total")-last("used"))/1024/1024/1024 , last("used")  / 1024/1024/1024, last("total")  / 1024/1024/1024 FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path", "device"
